name: Scrying Materials
tooltip:
Scrying Materials

Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard, 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Large Brilliant Shard
- Large Radiant Shard
- Huge Emerald
